title: Social Graph (Follow System)
problem: The social graph is the foundation of connection in SocialHub. Users need to follow others to build their timeline and establish relationships.
success_metrics: Follower and following counts display correctly
Followers list page shows all followers
Following list page shows all following

items.title: Follow Model & Service
items.description: Define follow relationship model and service for managing follows.
acceptance_criteria: Follow interface with id, followerId, followingId, createdAt
FollowService with methods: followUser, unfollowUser, isFollowing, getFollowers, getFollowing

items.title: Follow Button Component
items.description: Create the follow/unfollow button with state management.
acceptance_criteria: Shows 'Following' when following (with hover to show 'Unfollow')
Works on profile pages and cards

items.title: Followers Page
items.description: Create the followers list page showing users who follow a profile.

items.title: Following Page
items.description: Create the following list page showing users a profile follows.
acceptance_criteria: Empty state when not following anyone

items.title: Profile Stats Integration
items.description: Integrate follow counts into profile display and make them clickable.
acceptance_criteria: Clicking counts navigates to respective list pages
